name: Space Shift (No Gravity Games)
description:
Space Shift is a 3D logical game inspired by classic puzzle, the legendary Sokoban! 

Space Shift is played on a three-dimensional board. 

Your task is to push different coloured boxes to the proper place. You must plan your movements carefully not to block the way to the correct placement of the boxes. Special fields, which introduce additional mechanisms on the board, provide additional difficulty. 

The game is simple at the beginning and quickly becomes a challenge for the strongest minds.

FEATURES:

🧊 an addictive 3D logical game inspired by a classic puzzle, the legendary Sokoban! 
🧊 45 diversified levels to solve!
🧊 3 colours of boxes to handle and special fields to make your life easier... or even more difficult,
🧊 time-limited tasks,
🧊 funny dialogues with player instructions.
